statements.statement: select * from SWfsIndexNewArrival where Status=1 and DataState=1 and pageno=@PageNo #if($PagePositionNo!='') and PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo #end #if($TitleName!='') and NewArrivalTitle like '%'+@TitleName+'%' #end #if($StartTime!='') and StartDate >=@StartTime #end #if($EndTime!='') and StartDate <=@EndTime #end order by StartDate desc
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SWfsIndexNewArrival WHERE 1=1 and PageNo=@PageNo and PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo and Status=1 AND DataState=1 and (GETDATE()>=StartDate) ORDER BY StartDate DESC

SELECT x.NewArrivalProductListId , a.ProductNo , a.ProductModel AS GoodsNo , x.Status , a.ProductName , e.ProductShowPic AS ProductPicFile , d.BrandCnName , d.BrandEnName , x.NewArrivalId , x.sortvalue , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY sortvalue DESC ) AS row FROM SpProduct a INNER JOIN SWfsIndexNewArrivalProductList x ON x.productno = a.productno LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend AS e ( NOLOCK ) ON e.ProductNo = a.ProductNo LEFT JOIN SpBrand AS d ( NOLOCK ) ON a.BrandNo = d.BrandNo WHERE x.NewArrivalId = @NewArrivalId AND x.DataState = 1 and x.Status =1 AND e.TypeFlag = 1 and a.DataState=1
update SWfsIndexNewArrivalProductList set DataState=255 where NewArrivalProductListId=@NewArrivalProductListId
update SWfsIndexNewArrival set DataState=255 where NewArrivalId=@NewArrivalId
update SWfsIndexNewArrivalProductList set DataState=255 where NewArrivalId=@NewArrivalId
select * from SWfsGlobalConfig where FunctionNo=@FunctionNo
update SWfsGlobalConfig set ConfigValue=@ConfigValue where FunctionNo='ShoesNewArrival'
select max(sortvalue) from SWfsIndexNewArrivalProductList where NewArrivalId=@NewArrivalId

select count(0) from SpProduct as a with(nolock) INNER join SpfProductExtend as e(nolock) on e.ProductNo=a.ProductNo INNER JOIN (SELECT ProductNo FROM dbo.SpfSkuExtend skue (NOLOCK) WHERE skue.PcSaleState=2 GROUP BY ProductNo) AS t ON t.ProductNo=a.ProductNo left join SpBrand as c with(nolock) on a.BrandNo = c.BrandNo where e.TypeFlag=1 and a.DataState = 1 and e.ProductShowPic <> '' and e.Status=1 and e.DataState=1 #if($Keyword!='') and (a.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductNo =@KeyWord or a.ProductModel =@KeyWord) #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and a.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and a.ProductType=@Gender #end #if($BrandNO !='') and a.BrandNO=@BrandNO #end

WITH temp AS ( SELECT a.ProductNo , a.ProductModel AS GoodsNo , ProductName , e.ProductShowPic AS ProductPicFile , a.BrandNo , d.BrandCnName , d.BrandEnName , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY a.ProductNo ) AS row FROM SpProduct AS a ( NOLOCK ) LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend AS e ( NOLOCK ) ON e.ProductNo = a.ProductNo LEFT JOIN SpBrand AS d ( NOLOCK ) ON a.BrandNo = d.BrandNo WHERE e.TypeFlag=1 and a.DataState = 1 and e.Status=1 and e.DataState=1 #if($Keyword!='') AND (a.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' OR a.ProductNo =@KeyWord OR a.ProductModel =@KeyWord) #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and a.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and a.ProductType=@Gender #end #if($BrandNO !='') and d.BrandNo=@BrandNO #end ) SELECT * FROM temp WHERE row BETWEEN ( @pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 AND @pageIndex * @pageSize
$sqlstring

select SpProduct.productNo,SpfProductExtend.ProductShowPic as ProductPicFile from SpProduct(nolock) inner join SpfProductExtend(nolock) on SpProduct.ProductNo=SpfProductExtend.ProductNo where SpfProductExtend.TypeFlag=1 and SpProduct.ProductNo=@ProductNo
select sortvalue from SWfsIndexNewArrival where status = 1 and datastate = 1 and PageNo=@PageNo and PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo
select * from SWfsIndexNewArrival where status = 1 and datastate = 1 and NewArrivalId=@NewArrivalId
select count(0) from SWfsIndexNewArrival where StartDate=@StartDate and DataState=1 and status=1 and NewArrivalId != @NewArrivalId and PageNo=@PageNo and PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo

insert into SWfsIndexNewArrival(NewArrivalTitle,SortValue,WebSiteNo,PagePositionNo,PagePositionName,PageNo,CreateDate,StartDate,Status,DataState,OperateUserId) values(@NewArrivalTitle,@SortValue,@WebSiteNo,@PagePositionNo,@PagePositionName,@PageNo,@CreateDate,@StartDate,@Status,@DataState,@OperateUserId) SELECT @@IDENTITY;
select top 1 NewArrivalNoticName,NewArrivalNoticDate from SWfsNewArrivalNotice where status=1 and datastate = 1 and NewArrivalNoticDate>getdate() and PageNo=@PageNo order by NewArrivalNoticDate
select * from SWfsIndexModule (nolock) where dataState=1 and PageNo=@PageNo and WebSiteNo=@WebSiteNo order by sort asc

select NewArrivalNoticeId,NewArrivalNoticName,NewArrivalNoticDate,WebSiteNo,PageNo,PagePositionNo,PagePositonName,[Status],DataState,OperateUserId,CreateDate,UpdateDate,UpdateOperateUserId from SWfsNewArrivalNotice(nolock) where PageNo=@PageNo and WebsiteNo=@WebsiteNo and [Status]='1' and DataState='1' and NewArrivalNoticName like '%'+ @KeyWord + '%' #if($BeginTime!='') and NewArrivalNoticDate >= @BeginTime #end #if($EndTime!='') and NewArrivalNoticDate <= @EndTime #end order by NewArrivalNoticDate desc

select NewArrivalNoticeId from SWfsNewArrivalNotice(nolock) where PageNo=@PageNo and NewArrivalNoticDate between @NewArrivalNoticDateStart and @NewArrivalNoticDateEnd and [Status]='1' and DataState='1'

with temp as( select *,row_number() over(order by DateCreate desc) as _row from SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) where 1=1 and PictureName like '%'+cast(@PictureName as nvarchar)+'%' #if($DateBegin!='') and DateBegin >= @DateBegin #end #if($DateEnd!='') and DateBegin <= @DateEnd #end #if($PictureIndex!=-1) and PictureIndex = @PictureIndex #end and PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo and WebSiteNo=@WebSiteNo and PageNo=@PageNo and DataState=1 )select * from temp where _row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize

select count(1) from SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) where 1=1 and PictureName like '%'+cast(@PictureName as nvarchar)+'%' #if($DateBegin!='') and DateBegin >= @DateBegin #end #if($DateEnd!='') and DateBegin <= @DateEnd #end #if($PictureIndex!=-1) and PictureIndex = @PictureIndex #end and PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo and PageNo=@PageNo and WebSiteNo=@WebSiteNo and DataState=1

declare @TopCount int set @TopCount=@tops #if($ADShowType=='0') SELECT top (@TopCount) pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=0 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc #end #if($ADShowType=='1') SELECT top (@TopCount) pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=0 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc #end #if($ADShowType=='5') select * from (SELECT top (@TopCount) pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>=pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=0 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc ) as p0 UNION select * from ( SELECT top (@TopCount) pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>=pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=1 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc ) as p1 UNION select * from ( SELECT top (@TopCount) pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>=pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=2 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc ) as p2 UNION select * from ( SELECT top (@TopCount) pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>=pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=3 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc ) as p3 UNION select * from ( SELECT top (@TopCount) pic.* FROM SWfsIndexModule (nolock) module left join SWfsOperationPicture (nolock) pic on cast(module.moduleid as varchar(255) )=pic.PagePositionNo where pic.datastate=1 and getdate()>=pic.DateBegin and module.moduleid=@ModuleId and pic.PictureIndex=4 and pic.WebSiteNo=module.WebSiteNo and pic.PageNo=module.PageNo order by pic.DateBegin Desc ) as p4 #end
select top 1 [Status] from SWfsNewArrivalNotice where pageNo=@pageNo and WebSiteNo=@WebSiteNo and [Status]=1 and DataState=1
update SWfsNewArrivalNotice set [Status]=@DataState where PageNo=@PageNo and WebSiteNo=@WebSiteNo
select top 1 [Status] from SWfsOperationPicture where pageNo=@pageNo and WebSiteNo=@WebSiteNo and PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo and [Status]=1 and DataState=1
update SWfsOperationPicture set [Status]=@Status where PageNo=@PageNo and WebSiteNo=@WebSiteNo and PagePositionNo=@PagePositionNo
